title: ASCII characters are not pixels: a deep dive into ASCII rendering
author: alexharri
aiHeadline: Discover the mind-blowing revelation that ASCII characters aren't just pixels—because who would've guessed that letters could represent art?

title: US electricity demand surged in 2025 – solar handled 61% of it
author: doener
aiHeadline: In 2025, US electricity demand skyrocketed, and solar power heroically saved the day by handling 61% of it—because clearly, we're all just waiting for the sun to run out.

title: The recurring dream of replacing developers
author: glimshe
aiHeadline: The never-ending fantasy of replacing developers with AI continues, because what could possibly go wrong with automating the people who write the code that runs everything?

title: PCs refuse to shut down after Microsoft patch
author: smurda
aiHeadline: Microsoft's latest patch ensures your PC stays powered on indefinitely, because who needs sleep when you can have a forced all-nighter with your computer?

title: Map To Poster – Create Art of your favourite city
author: originalankur
aiHeadline: Transform your city into a masterpiece with Map To Poster—because who needs a vacation when you can have a digital postcard of your hometown?
